name: Adulthood - a short story
description:
A short story about getting adult and mental health. 

Entry for Global Game Jam 2022 - Serious Games with the theme "Duality"

Game by

Laura del Pino Díaz  - programming, art direction and story

Jonathan Galindo - sound design
